description: INFINITY MAXI BIZ is an innovative digital asset project based on NFTs and blockchain technology, centered around a collection of unique PFP (Profile Picture) NFTs with diverse characters and stories, aimed at expanding its ecosystem. Rebranded from the initial project, DFINITY MAXI BIZ, INFINITY MAXI BIZ has set more expansive visions and goals. Core Concepts and Vision: Unique NFT Collection: INFINITY MAXI BIZ started with a collection of 77 original and distinctive PFP NFTs. Each NFT features unique characters and narratives, allowing users to embark on imaginative adventures. These limited-edition NFTs are rare and highly valuable assets, forming the core of the project. Community-Centered Ecosystem: INFINITY MAXI BIZ offers various benefits to NFT holders, encouraging active community participation. Holders gain access to exclusive channels on Discord, participate in governance voting, and help shape the project's future direction. Additionally, airdrops, customized NFTs, and other rewards are provided. IP Expansion and Collaboration: The project aims to go beyond just an NFT collection by collaborating with other NFT projects to expand the world of INFINITY MAXI BIZ. The goal is to spread awareness and strengthen the ecosystem by reaching a broader audience. Animation IP Expansion Using UE5 and Blender: INFINITY MAXI BIZ plans to produce high-quality animations featuring its characters using Unreal Engine 5 and Blender. Through these animations, the project will expand its universe and broaden the IPâ€™s reach. This will enhance the visual experience and allow users to engage more deeply with the charm of the characters.]
name: INFINITY Maxi Biz
